abstract: Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway was stripped of its ‘AAA’ credit rating by Fitch, barely hours after Standard & Poor’s cut General Electric‘s top-tier rating, as the global financial crisis pummels America’s corporate titans.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway was stripped of its ‘AAA’ credit rating by Fitch, barely hours after Standard & Poor’s cut General Electric‘s top-tier rating, as the global financial crisis pummels America’s corporate titans.

headline.main: Fitch Cuts Top Rating on Buffett’s Berkshire

abstract: Warren E. Buffett, the world’s second-richest man, was paid only $175,000 last year by his company, Berkshire Hathaway.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett, the world’s second-richest man, was paid only $175,000 last year by his company, Berkshire Hathaway.

headline.main: No Bonuses Here: Buffett Is Paid Just $175,000
